title: Pixel 3 Home button and Mobile Data not working after force restarts
content:
I've posted the full text in the "Other" category as it referred to multiple issues that occurrred at the same time. However, one of those was a problem with Mobile Data so I'm posting the link to that under this category too: https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/17677180?hl=en.
Please post all replies to that item, not this one.
